title: Reorganize GeoExactCircle tests
description:
Hi Karl Wright,

Test for exact circles are getting  a bit messy so I think it is a good idea to group them in their own test class.

comments.content: This patch places all GeoExactCircle tests in its own class. I have lower the iterations of one of the tests as it was too high.
comments.author: Ignacio Vera

comments.content: I will look at this when I have a moment, which frankly I don't expect to have for at least four days.
comments.author: Karl Wright

comments.content:
That's fine. I think we need one more iteration to have a working circle ( at least in WGS84 which is my objective).

Let me know when you have time.
comments.author: Ignacio Vera
